name: Q1 2024 Security Audit Report
content:
Q1 2024 Security Audit Report

Executive Summary:

Comprehensive security audit of SynergyOS infrastructure and applications conducted between January 1 - March 31, 2024.

Scope:

  • Infrastructure Security

  • Application Security

  • Data Protection

  • Access Control

  • Compliance Status

Key Findings:

  1. Critical Issues (0)

  2. High Priority (2)

    • Outdated TLS configuration

    • Weak password policy

  3. Medium Priority (5)

    • Missing WAF rules

    • Incomplete audit logs

    • Outdated dependencies

  4. Low Priority (8)

    • Documentation gaps

    • Minor config issues

Compliance Status:

  • SOC 2 Type II: Compliant

  • GDPR: Compliant

  • ISO 27001: In Progress

  • HIPAA: N/A

Recommendations:

  1. High Priority

    • Upgrade TLS to 1.3

    • Implement stronger password requirements

  2. Medium Priority

    • Deploy additional WAF rules

    • Enhance logging system

    • Update dependencies

Action Plan:

  • Week 1-2: Address high priority issues

  • Week 3-4: Resolve medium priority findings

  • Week 5-6: Document and verify fixes

  • Week 7-8: Follow-up audit

Next Review:

Q2 2024 (June 30, 2024)
